title: Richardson pleased with captains' leadership
text: Saturday, October 17, 2015 - 2:06:56 AM Local Sports Richardson pleased with captains' leadership 10/15/2015 (Updated 10/16/2015 4:18:45 PM) Before the B-Sens season opener against Albany last Saturday, Luke Richardson said it could be a while before the team names its captains. Then, a day or two later, Zach Stortini was given the C and Mark Fraser and Patrick Mullen the A's. While Stortini and Mullen earned assists in the 4-1 season opening win, Richardson saw the value all three brought as veteran leaders on the ice, on the bench, and in the locker room.
